hymn.title: In the mighty Name of Jesus

layout.singingstanza: In the might -- y Name of Je -- sus, When we bow be -- fore the throne, Ma -- ny dead -- ly foes are van -- quished, Ma -- ny vic -- tor -- ies are won. Might -- y Name! Might -- y Name! In that Name a -- lone we win. Might -- y Name! Might -- y Name! Con -- quering Sa -- tan, death and sin.

lyrics.stanza: In the mighty Name of Jesus, When we bow before the throne, Many deadly foes are vanquished, Many victories are won.
Mighty Name! Mighty Name! In that Name alone we win. Mighty Name! Mighty Name! Conquering Satan, death and sin.
When we plead the Name of Jesus, Satan and his hosts must flee. Jesus! Jesus! Precious Jesus! In Thy Name is victory.
Soon shall come the blessed moment When the battle shall be won, When the Mighty Name of Jesus Shall exalt us to the throne.
